choose.otherwise: `menu_id` AS `menuId`, `menu_name` AS `menuName`, `parent_id` AS `parentId`, `order_num` AS `orderNum`, `url` AS `url`, `menu_type` AS `menuType`, `visible` AS `visible`, `perms` AS `perms`, `icon` AS `icon`, `create_by` AS `createBy`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `update_by` AS `updateBy`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`, `remark` AS `remark`
